department.ch: 工業管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch:
The KIDD class was a very powerful multi-purpose guided missile destroyer in the U.S. Navy in 1981-1999. The four ships of this class, originally designed for sale to the Iranian Navy, are unique among the U.S. Navy warships because it combines the combat system capability of the former Spruance class destroyer. The four KIDD class ships are similar to the Spruance class destroyers, but have greater displacement and an improved combat system.
KIDD class combat system is the combination of weapons, electronic subsystem, and equipment, which collectively enables her to carry out combat missions (anti-air, anti-submarine, anti-surface, electronic, and communication warfare).
The course objective is to introduce project management for the R.O.C. Navy through FMS (foreign military sales) and purchase process for the KIDD class guided missile destroyer.
goal.en:
The KIDD class was a very powerful multi-purpose guided missile destroyer in the U.S. Navy in 1981-1999. The four ships of this class, originally designed for sale to the Iranian Navy, are unique among the U.S. Navy warships because it combines the combat system capability of the former Spruance class destroyer. The four KIDD class ships are similar to the Spruance class destroyers, but have greater displacement and an improved combat system.
KIDD class combat system is the combination of weapons, electronic subsystem, and equipment, which collectively enables her to carry out combat missions (anti-air, anti-submarine, anti-surface, electronic, and communication warfare).
The course objective is to introduce project management for the R.O.C. Navy through FMS (foreign military sales) and purchase process for the KIDD class guided missile destroyer.

week2      軍購定義

outline.en:
week1 Introduce Course Objective
week2 FMS (foreign military sales)
week3 FMS (foreign military sales)
week4 KIDD class ship project initiation
week5 KIDD class ship project initiation
week6 KIDD class ship project planning
week7 KIDD class ship project planning
week8      KIDD class ship project risk management
week9 KIDD class ship project risk management
week10 KIDD class ship project implementation
week11 KIDD class ship project implementation
week12 KIDD class ship project implementation
week13    KIDD class ship project monitoring
week14 KIDD class ship project leadership
week15 KIDD class ship project leadership
week16 KIDD class ship training
week17 KIDD class ship ILS (integrate logistics support)
week18Final test

ch.competencies: 獨立思考和解決問題能力
